title: Dollar Posts Biggest Gain Since May as Precious Metals Plunge
description: The dollar jumped the most since May, ending a volatile month on an up note as plunging gold and silver prices dragged down currencies from Australia to Sweden.
content: The dollar jumped the most since May, ending a volatile month on an up note as plunging gold and silver prices dragged down currencies from Australia to Sweden.
